return.name: appDir
return.description: Returns the URL of the local directory where the App's files are located.

page.description: Gets the directory where the App files are stored.

discussion.p: The *[js:getAppDir()]* method returns the URL on the device's file system where an App's files are stored. This is separate from the directory where an App's data file are stored. See [getAppFileStorageDir()] to get the location of data files for an App.
